task.title: Make an Announcement to a Specific User
task.shortdesc: Extension users can dial the intercom feature code to make an intercom to a specific extension, the called party can respond immediately without picking up the handset.

taskbody.context:
The default Intercom feature code is *5.
In this way, the audio is two way, both the caller and called party can hear each other.
taskbody.example:
Extension user 2000 makes an intercom call to extension user 1000.
Dial *51000 on the phone of extension 2000.
The call on extension 1000 will be answered automatically.
